Description: L-shaped tapestry motif now in two fragments, perhaps originally from a draped rectangular mantle. Undyed light and dark blue cotton. Within motif design arranged as horizontal stripes - on a dark blue ground, plant border with symmetrical hooks in undyed cotton alternating with arrow shapes in light blue, dots at centre. Border around motif of undyed dots on dark blue.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), room 2 lower level fill
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
